meanings.definition: Small spherical grains found in meteorites.
meanings.sent1: The chondrules in the meteorite were tiny and round.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study chondrules to learn more about space rocks.
meanings.sent3: The chondrules in the meteorite looked like little planets.
meanings.sent4: Each chondrule in the meteorite held secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The chondrules sparkled like stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A type of mineral grain found in certain types of rocks.
meanings.sent1: Miners discovered chondrules in the rock formations.
meanings.sent2: Geologists identify chondrules based on their composition.
meanings.sent3: The chondrules in the rock seemed to wink at the geologist.
meanings.sent4: The chondrules were like hidden gems waiting to be uncovered.
meanings.sent5: The chondrules added a touch of mystery to the rocky landscape.
